data_quality_notes: published_at being null means the post is a draft
view_count is incremented on each page view
slug must be unique and URL-safe

columns.user_id: Author of the post, FK -> users.id
columns.title: Post title
columns.slug: URL-friendly version of the title, unique
columns.view_count: Number of times the post has been viewed (default: 0)
columns.published_at: When the post was published, null for drafts
columns.updated_at: When the post was last updated

relationships: Belongs to users via user_id -> users.id (the author)
Belongs to many tags via post_tag pivot table
